title: New York Cheesecake
ingredients: Crust: 2 cups graham cracker crumbs, 6 tbsp butter melted, 2 tbsp sugar
Filling: 32 oz cream cheese softened, 1 cup sugar, 1 tbsp vanilla, ¼ tsp salt, 4 eggs, ⅔ cup sour cream
steps: Preheat oven to 325°F. Wrap springform pan with foil.
Mix crust ingredients. Press into pan bottom and 1 inch up sides.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Add vanilla and salt.
Add eggs one at a time. Stir in sour cream.
Pour into crust. Place in roasting pan, add hot water halfway up sides.
Bake until edges set and center jiggles slightly, 60-70 minutes.
Turn off oven, crack door, cool 1 hour in oven.
notes: Room temp cream cheese prevents lumps.
